channel.title: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!
channel.description:
so i was thinking and i believe that the greatest way to end Half-life would be, Gordon traps the Combine leaders on earth. He sets up the final shot, fires. You hear a buzzing noise, then the screen goes blurry as and a new image comes through. YOU'RE BACK IN BLACK MESA DORMS, and your alarm is going off. After that you get up get ready for your shift. go through the intro to HL1, do the experiment and NOTHING GOES WRONG!
Gordon knew what could have happened if something went wrong. With all the stress, he dreamed up a scenario of what could have happened.
or even go all the way to MIT graduation day.

You mean like this:

What about…
a little more fun way to ay who the G-man really was!

item.dc:creator: Nightmare470
item.description:
johnyo:

When the test chamber was breefly seen in HL2 it was 100% recognisable. If Valve would want to show the lobby they wouldn’t make it FUBAR. So it is another location in the vast BMRF and not the lobby seen in HL.

Yea, that was only the Sector C test labs Lobby.

mechaelite:

Eeeeeeeeh… Do I belive you all want Gordon and Alyx having a son to do a hl3? Actually no need, they could do the seven hour war in hl3 playing with barney or how alyx scaped from black mesa or even a new adventure with Shephard…

geez… we’re just screwing around with lame endings for hl2 ep3…

yeah, i know about all of those things, but i really don’t see how could alyx get pregnant with freeman without the player playing through it. except alyx raping gordon after knocking him out or something like that.

item.source: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!

item.title: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!
item.dc:creator: mouserider
item.description:
johnyo:

'cept for the knockout in HL. And the ride in the stalker pod in HL2. And the end of HL2 and the beginning of ep1. Oh, and when Alyx gets stabbed and during the vort ritual in ep2.

'cept the 20 years between HL and HL2. And during the 2nd teleportation in HL2.

Oooooookaaaayyyyy… That’s good to know.

yeah, i know about all of those things, but i really don’t see how could alyx get pregnant with freeman without the player playing through it. except alyx raping gordon after knocking him out or something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!

item.title: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
mouserider:

right. and since in half life you never loose control of freeman, nor jump ahead in time, there should be a kinky sex scene with alyx where you use the mouse to slide it in and out and change positions with the number keys.

you have my vote

I was just being facetious with the soap opera ending , but I think you really mean what you say having the moves and all worked out.

freundin88:

Okay, if Half Life 2 Ep 3 is going to be the end of the story, I think Gordon should die saving the universe ……………BUT…………Alyx is pregnant with his son to carry on for him. How’s that? :’(

right. and since in half life you never loose control of freeman, nor jump ahead in time, there should be a kinky sex scene with alyx where you use the mouse to slide it in and out and change positions with the number keys.

you have my vote

item.source: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!

item.title: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!
item.dc:creator: DeleteThis
item.description:
Nerdguy:

I’m thinking of plenty endings, many are just nonsense:

1.Gordon defeated the combine and then G-man come(lol) and trap you and “You are no longer needed, Freeman” -Gman. Then he charges up his kameh-kamehaa, suddenly a cat teleports just above him and kleiner realized that the previous teleporter is VERY VERY VERY SLOW. The cat lands on Gman, screwing his Kameh-Kameehaa, it blows up, leaving a crater, you gman and others within the radius died. When other peeps come there they found a cat innocently taking a nap in the middle of the crater.

2.Gordon defeated the combine by a huge explosion and then the screen fades to white. when he woken up he is inside a courtroom with gman on the defendant’s chair, Dr.Breen as defense, Magnusson as judge, and you be the prosecutor. Then an ace attorney style courtroom battle begins.

3.The combine is almost defeated, Magnusson sends Alyx to defeat the rest of the combine somewhere to give Gordon a rest(seriously!). After the combine is defeated, a huge force of xen aliens swarms to alyx’s position. Magnusson declined to help and leaving Alyx overwhelmed. Gordon enraged, protesting to Magnusson, but he don’t listen, the resistance retake earth, and renamed themselves as the “Human Dominion”, while Magnusson proclaimed himself as “Emperor Magnusson”. Enraged Gordon formed another rebellion group against Magnusson called “Freeman’s Raiders”. Meanwhile the xen aliens captured Alyx and use some crap to alien-ised her, then it was born, Infested Alyx, leading the xen aliens.(obvious Starcraft reference)

And the greatest way to really end Half Life is…
Nuke Valve’s HQ[/SIZE]

I started to laugh around the human dominion part

Read full topic
item.source: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!

item.title: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
My point was that Valve pay very much attention to detail. They would never remake the lobby as kinda-similar-but-not-really-the-same as in HL.

On a side note, is it of any significance whatsoever what particular location in BMRF it is?

Read full topic
item.source: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!

item.title: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
johnyo:

When the test chamber was breefly seen in HL2 it was 100% recognisable. If Valve would want to show the lobby they wouldn’t make it FUBAR. So it is another location in the vast BMRF and not the lobby seen in HL.

The reason It was 100% recognizable is because it was pretty much copied and pasted strait from HL1. If they did that with the lobby, it would have looked really jarring especially with the high-poly gman sitting in the middle of the room.

Read full topic
item.source: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!

item.title: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
Nerdguy:

I’m thinking of plenty endings, many are just nonsense:

1.Gordon defeated the combine and then G-man come(lol) and trap you and “You are no longer needed, Freeman” -Gman. Then he charges up his kameh-kamehaa, suddenly a cat teleports just above him and kleiner realized that the previous teleporter is VERY VERY VERY SLOW. The cat lands on Gman, screwing his Kameh-Kameehaa, it blows up, leaving a crater, you gman and others within the radius died. When other peeps come there they found a cat innocently taking a nap in the middle of the crater.

2.Gordon defeated the combine by a huge explosion and then the screen fades to white. when he woken up he is inside a courtroom with gman on the defendant’s chair, Dr.Breen as defense, Magnusson as judge, and you be the prosecutor. Then an ace attorney style courtroom battle begins.

3.The combine is almost defeated, Magnusson sends Alyx to defeat the rest of the combine somewhere to give Gordon a rest(seriously!). After the combine is defeated, a huge force of xen aliens swarms to alyx’s position. Magnusson declined to help and leaving Alyx overwhelmed. Gordon enraged, protesting to Magnusson, but he don’t listen, the resistance retake earth, and renamed themselves as the “Human Dominion”, while Magnusson proclaimed himself as “Emperor Magnusson”. Enraged Gordon formed another rebellion group against Magnusson called “Freeman’s Raiders”. Meanwhile the xen aliens captured Alyx and use some crap to alien-ised her, then it was born, Infested Alyx, leading the xen aliens.(obvious Starcraft reference)

And the greatest way to really end Half Life is…
Nuke Valve’s HQ[/SIZE]

Wow, now that’s a script. It must of taken months to write that. I can hardly imagine the excitement you felt when you realized that there was an exact Black Mesa thread for which you could share your ideas. Ill try to represent it in smiles, just because there silly.

Start writing — — checking out the BM forums — :jizz: :freeman: — read responces — :fffuuu:

Read full topic
item.source: the greatest way to end half-life(imo)!
